/>
Introduction
This topic includes information clarifying the principles for assigning effective dates for claims for direct and secondary SC under 38 CFR 3.400(b)(2), including
procedures for handling claims for direct SC
example 1 of the effective date for direct SC
example 2 of the effective date for direct SC
claims for compensation received within one year of dishonorable service
effective date for a claim received during a period of hospitalization
effective dates for secondary SC
, and
correlation between effective date for primary and secondary SC
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Effective Dates
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A
